title: Yasuo gets tanky?
body: How does Tabi make him SO TANKY that Yorick with Trinity + Black Cleaver deals next to nothing? That makes no sense

replies.body:
They dont.

Something more was going on, like the yorick being utter trash, or the yasuo having a lot more than tabi.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s1PXzxYE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-19T20:16:30.547+0000)
>
> They dont.
> 
> Something more was going on, like the yorick being utter trash, or the yasuo having a lot more than tabi.

Look in my match history, and I was the "trash Yorick".

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s1PXzxYE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-08-19T20:17:50.462+0000)
>
> Look in my match history, and I was the "trash Yorick".

A Long Sword and Kindlegem is not a Black Cleaver.

> [{quoted}](name=Darkdemon653,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s1PXzxYE,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2017-08-19T20:48:29.525+0000)
>
> A Long Sword and Kindlegem is not a Black Cleaver.

I gave it up to get Randuin's instead then start working back into it

Besides this has happened a few other times when I had the full cleaver

Your username looks oddly familiar..

Oh, right. the guy that cries on the forums every time they get outplayed.

I am starting to think you are some sort of persistent troll..

Yasuo is not tanky at all. He has ranged character's stats and scalings. He probably had more than a Tabi, possibly a PD and some Life Steal.

Anyway, if you could post the match it would allow us to give you an accurate answer!

Lol just checked your game and it's exactly how I expected.

Yasuo was 13-9 by the end of the game and you were 2-9, so I assume he was 2-3 levels ahead of you whenever that fight occurred.

Yasuo had tabi which gives decent amount of armor that reduces your overall damage as well as 10% additional reduced damage from your autos and Qs. Yasuo had PD which gives 12% overall damage reduction. Yasuo have has passive shield which makes him quite tanky at the beginning of a fight and considering he had his double crit core + some lifesteal it'd look like you're not damaging him at all which I assume what did happen.

Idk much about Yorick but if you failed to shut down yasuo as a top lane bruiser and let him reach his double crit core + some hp/armor items he'd steamroll you easily unless you play a skirmisher that outscales him.

I don't see the issue here really.

Tabis are broken
More news at 11
